29 CFR 1910.135.description: Protective helmets shall be worn in areas where there is a potential for head injury.

29 CFR 1910.178.description: Powered industrial truck operations require separation between vehicles and pedestrians.

29 CFR 1910.23.description: Guardrail systems must be provided to protect employees from falls.

29 CFR 1910.27.description: Ladders must be used properly and maintained to prevent employee injury.
